Key Match Events: The Detroit Tigers won Game 2 of the ALDS with a 3-0 victory over Cleveland
Pre-Game Insights: Javier Báez surprised his teammates by walking into the clubhouse before Game 2
Javy Báez's presence meant a lot to his teammates
Báez had hip surgery and is out for the season
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said Báez will be in Detroit for Game 3
Báez was in the Tigers dugout but not wearing a uniform during Monday's game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Báez was in Puerto Rico attending family matters before returning to Detroit
The Tigers' pitching plan for Game 3 is uncertain
The Tigers will inform Cleveland of their pitching plan on Tuesday night
Others: The Tigers' uncertainty in pitching is 'definitely different' according to Cleveland's Steven Kwan
Kwan said the Tigers' 'pitching chaos' is unique but they have a good gameplan
